docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Nov. 3--The nine-nation Latin American Free Trade Association in session here has reached the hard core of the problem of achieving its third annual round of tariff cuts.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Nov. 3--The nine-nation Latin American Free Trade Association in session here has reached the hard core of the problem of achieving its third annual round of tariff cuts.
docs.abstract: 4 members of 9-nation Free Trade Assn seek special treatment or exemptions to develop and protect new industries, dimming outlook for 3d round of sweeping tariff cuts; fear cuts would give 3 big indus nations (Brazil, Mex, Argentina) too big an advantage

headline.main: Tariff Cutting Poses Problems For Latin American Trade Bloc

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Nov. 9.--The first comprehensive economic survey in Uruguay's history gives an alarming picture of stagnation and decline, endangering the country's living standards.

docs.snippet: Foreign exchange market continued to maintain a steady undertone during the past week. British pound sterling and Canadian dollar moved narrowly on moderate dealings.  Spot pound sterling finished out at $2.7979, off 1 point. Forwards for 90 days...
docs.lead_paragraph: Foreign exchange market continued to maintain a steady undertone during the past week. British pound sterling and Canadian dollar moved narrowly on moderate dealings. Spot pound sterling finished out at $2.7979, off 1 point. Forwards for 90 days delivery were quoted at $2.7967.
